message.body: This is the first time I'm Participating in this, so hey! Let me know if I'm doing it wrong!
Hi! Sorry I'm so late responding. I was taking a nap. You appear to be doing it right.
A nap that early in the day sounds nice. Actually, a nap anytime sounds nice. I'm in rehearsal and tech for the whole day and perform tonight.
Are you in theater or dance?
Theater that sometimes looks a lot like dance
Gotcha, I watched that documentary about Pi√±a recently, have worked a lot in theater, and I have a puppet/performance group.

Oof I dropped the ball here - obviously things got intense around the performance! I know a few puppet/performance groups.... And actually joined this research bc of a post on facebook from someone who also has a puppet performance group... Hah. I haven't read the rules so I shouldn't say more? But it'd be crazy if it was you.
